title: Workout Tracker
concept: The workout tracker is an app designed to help people track their workout progress as they build healthy habits.

title: COVID Germ Pod
concept: Social distancing tool that let's users organize groups that follow similar pandemic precautions.

title: E-commerce Backend
concept: This project is designed to replicate on a small scale the operation of the back-end of an e-commerce site.

title: README Generator
concept: The README_Generator is designed to enable busy web developers to create a professional project readme by simply answering a series of questions.

title: Meal Planner
concept: Meal Planner enables you to search for recipe ideas by meal name and save your recipe links to a built-in weekly calender.
technologies: MealDB API, CocktailDB API, HTML, CSS, Materialize, Javascript, Jquery, JSON, AJAX, Luxon Library

title: Password Generator
concept: Users of my Password Generator app can have the app create completely random passwords based off criteria set by the user.
